mapper.select: SELECT u.user_cd AS userCd, SUM(gu.gas_usage) AS usageAmount, SUM(gu.gas_usage * g.charge) AS totalCharge FROM t_user u JOIN t_gas_usage gu ON u.user_cd = gu.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON gu.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd
